definitions.text: a principle or condition that customarily governs behavior
examples: it was his rule to take a walk before breakfast

definitions.text: the state of being controlled or governed
(embryology) the ability of an early embryo to continue normal development after its structure has been somehow damaged or altered
the act of bringing to uniformity; making regular
the act of controlling or directing according to rule
examples: fiscal regulations are in the hands of politicians

definitions.text: prescribed by or according to regulation
